Articles.Content: There is a glitch happening with Extraplanetary launchpads; Whenever I try to build a craft, the progress bar UI shows up but nothing happens, it remain at zero percent complete and the timer says zero seconds, I just can't build any crafts. The mod worked perfectly fine until the 1.2.2 update. If anyone has the solution, please tell me.

You will probably have better luck posting in the EL release thread (or at least reading through it, as you aren't the first to ask that kind of question).  And you will definitely need to add more details.  Mods used, logfiles.  What is your Productivity at in the workshop...?
Had this happen to me, double-check productivity. Building from a survey station without a workshop requires rather smart kerbals to get a positive score.
happened to me too, i think the problem is in the code of EL bc all my workshops show no productivity regardless of the productivity factor
